Name: Radiant Beautifish
Description: A Mount Imagine that increases Moving Speed and offers unique skills for a different experience.
Description2: A vehicle fantasy poetically hailed as "the wanderer of earthly realms." Designed as a koi fish, this vehicle fantasy glides over land with liquid grace, immersing riders in the illusion of aquatic flight.Rumored to be an omen of good fortune, it brings serendipity in its wake.
